org.sd.text
Class CapitalizedPhraseSplitter

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.AbstractWordGramSplitter
      org.sd.text.CapitalizedPhraseSplitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordGramSplitter
public class CapitalizedPhraseSplitter
extends AbstractWordGramSplitter

A WordGramSplitter for extracting capitalized phrases from text.

Author:
Spence Koehler
